title: Connecting Client to Server with Socket.io
description: In this video, I look at how to add socket.io to both the node server and the client JavaScript.

timestamps.title: What we have done so far!
Referencing the socket library in the client code
Tracking every new socket connection to our web server
A recap and outlining the next steps before we go!

links.title: Socket.io
links.description: A library that enables bidirectional and event-based communication between a client and a server
